name: RAWRS
description:
RAWRS: An Animal Shelter Sim [IMPORTANT: READ FIRST BEFORE DOWNLOADING]

This game is a part of the thesis requirements of the programmers, Lance Co (TheMagicalFishTaco) and Li Niko Arceo (MojitoTheCat).

As such, please answer this survey BEFORE playing the game: RAWRSPrePlaySurvey

Then, please answer this survey AFTER playing the game: RAWRSPostPlaySurvey

Thank you for helping us graduate!!

Edit: If you are unable to extract the file "RAWRS.zip", please try  to extract "RAWRS.rar" instead. If you experience any more issues accessing the file, you may contact us through the following emails:

  • linikoarceo@gmail.com
  • lance.co@obf.ateneo.edu

RAWRS: Rafael Animal Welfare and Rescue Shelter is a 2D simulator game set within an animal shelter.

You play as a new volunteer at an animal shelter. After being dragged into it by your bestfriend Theo and with the help of the shelter's manager Cara, you gradually learn the ropes on what goes on inside the shelter. And maybe... You'll learn what it means to be a volunteer at RAWRS.
